# notellm_magic

Installable IPython/Jupyter extension providing the `%%cc` magic command.

## Structure

- `__init__.py` - Thin wrapper that loads `cc_jupyter`
- `cc_jupyter/` - Patched fork of `claude-code-jupyter-staging`

## Important

**Do not edit files in `cc_jupyter/` directly.**

This directory is generated by `build/build_notellm_magic.sh` from the pristine archive. Any manual changes will be overwritten on the next build.

To make changes:
1. Modify the patch logic in `build/build_notellm_magic.sh`
2. Run the build script to regenerate this directory

## Usage

After installation (`./setup.sh`):

```python
%load_ext notellm_magic

%%cc
Create a hello world script
```
